column4: Can anyone help me with java applets? I can't get them to load in ff.
I tried yahoo games and it brings up an error page with links for java downloads
and right now I am hanging on housecall.antivirus.com
what kind of system do you have? 32 or 64bit?
seems so. Have a look at http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1174435
did you read the section specific to your release?
and is a java plugin listed when you enter about:plugins as the URL?
then you need to remove all except the one you want to use
use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste the page contents
in a terminal, run 'sudo update-alternatives --config java' and tell me which one is configured (marked with a *)
change it so the icedtea jre is active
yes, try. The important thing is that the configured jre and your firefox plugin correspond.
